txt.en: You have aided in the search for the lost Ring-lore of Eregion.

The destruction of Eregion by Sauron in the Second Age scattered its vast knowledge of Ring-craft far and wide. The forces of Angmar have now taken an interest in gathering this lore for the purpose of reforging the ring Narchuil.\n\nBy aiding in the recovery of this lore, you both hinder the efforts of Angmar and further Elrond's research in a way to stop Amarthiel.
